page.title: 12WALKS AROUND LANGHOLM
page.content: {1 EASTON'S 5 JENNY NOBLE'S {2 ROUND HOUSE 6 TIBBIE LUG'S {3 THE MAST 7 WAUCHOPE KIRKYARD {4 MURTHOLM 8 THE MONUMENT { {EASTON'S WALK}_FROM THE MARKET PLACE WALK DOWN TO THE RIVER,CROSS THE SUSPENSION BRIDGE AND WALK THROUGH THE PARK.FOLLOW THE RIVERSIDE PATH THROUGH THE LOVELY BEECH TREES.TURN SHARP RIGHT UP THE HILL,PAST THE FARMHOUSE,DOWN GRANNY'S STEPS TO RETURN TO TOWN. {ROUND HOUSE}_WALK TOWARDS CARLISLE DOWN THE A7 AND TAKE THE STEEP ROAD UP ON THE LEFT PAST THE ASHLEY BANK HOTEL.PASS THE HOUSES IN NICE WOODLAND UNTIL THE ROAD TURNS INTO A TRACK. CARRY ON THROUGH THE GATE.THE ROUND HOUSE IS IN SIGHT.WHAT A LOVELY VIEW OF LANGHOLM FROM HERE!
